title: U.S. Moves to End Tax Treaty With Hungary
sub_head: Decision is a counterpunch against the country, which has resisted the global minimum tax deal pushed by the Biden administration
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”The U.S. Treasury Department is moving to terminate its tax treaty with Hungary, ending an agreement with a country that has been resisting the global minimum tax deal pushed by the Biden administration.
The move will take six months to complete, the department said Friday.
